title: Amanda Hess
itunes:title: Amanda Hess
itunes:subtitle: Amanda Hess is an American journalist. She is a critic-at-large for the New York Times who has also written for magazines including Wired, ESPN, and Elle. Anna invited Amanda on the podcast to discuss her piece Celebrity Culture Is Burning in the New York
description:
Read Amanda's New York Times piece Celebrity Culture is Burning
